title: Allow arbitrary tunnel to be established before connection
author: andrewheberle
body_snippet:
This is about implementing something very similar to what was done in #1568 , however the feature would be to allow an arbitrary executable to be used to tunnel/connect to the endpoint.

The specific use case I am thinking of is to utilize Cloudflare Access/Argo Tunnel to connect to remote resources, but any application/service that creates a TCP tunnel could be used.

AI triage (gemini): This feature allows users to establish arbitrary tunnels before initiating a connection, enhancing flexibility and security.
Approach: Implement new configuration options for arbitrary tunnels within connection objects, extend the connection establishment process to initiate configured tunnels before the main connection, and introduce new UI elements for tunnel management.
